Member Function Documentation

virtual void sxsdk::shape_saver_interface::set_undo ( void *  aux = 0  )  const [virtual]

Registers an undo task.

Registers an undo task that comprises one undo action. Equivalent to calling scene_interface::reset_undo() and then set_undo_action().

virtual void sxsdk::shape_saver_interface::set_undo_action ( void *  aux = 0  )  const [virtual]

Registers an undo action.

Registers an undo action. An undo task that can be invoked by the user comprise one or more undo actions.
